channel.title: Worlds Hardest Question
channel.description:
I was browsing through spawning every "Hand Item" I could possibly find. (Mixture between Gloves, Gauntlets and Vambraces)
There are 44 in total... (Excluding all noted varietys)
I got to the Family Crest Gloves and started spawning them...
775 Cooking Gauntlets 776 Goldsmith Gauntlets 777 Chaos Gauntlets 778 Steel Gauntlets
These are the item ID's from Item.CFG These ID's are also the same In Game... In my inventory and the bank exactly the same ID as the item database defines...
Here's the Question that I cannot for the life of me answer...
Look in your Character Save File (TXT) Under your inventory items or banked items cooking gauntlets are 776 !?! goldsmith 777, chaos 778 and steel 779...
Why have the items in your save file got +1 to the ID number?

item.title: Worlds Hardest Question
item.dc:creator: @Yogosun Yogosun
item.description:
@Yogosun wrote:

No, I was using CheezScape 78

That was only to learn the layout, I’ve stripped everything down and re-written the entire server from “Almost” scratch (I kept the “Imports” at the top…)

And I have no problems with it either, I’ve already explained what’s happened and write a mini tutorial how to fix it.

Read full topic

@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

your using nixascape right?
well i also use that

i’ll try for you, but i don’t promise anything
couse i’m doing something with teleports.

Read full topic

item.title: Worlds Hardest Question
item.dc:creator: @Yogosun Yogosun
item.description:
@Yogosun wrote:

Yeah, any item gets +1 to it’s ID in save file.

I’ve done my list of gloves now, Every glove possible in the entire game, there’s 44 of them.
I’ve also got them all in the bank and took a screenshot too, i’m building a visual database.

The Database will be like this

Head Equipment
Body Equipment
Legs Equipment
Hands Equipment // Completed
Feet Equipment
Back Equipment (Capes, Etc)
Weapon Orientated Equipment
Shield Orientated Equipment

(I’m not going to bother with rings, amulets and arrow slots yet)

Everything will be sorted by ID number and not the set it’s in, so you might be looking through Heads and find torags helm comes between bronze helm and iron helm, or a black helm might come before the bronze one.

Everything that fits in the specific slots will be listed, from weapons (bows, staffs, swords) to shields (books as well) Capes (Including Cloaks and Gowns) everything tested to see if it equips properlly.

In the end I will have an icon of every item in it’s specific field with a ID line from beginning to start for people to paste directly into their ITEM.JAVA

(Even the most up-to-date item databases are missing out barrows gloves and fremennik capes !!!)

Pretty Easy project, just Long and Tedious work…

Life would be MUCH easier if I knew a way to spawn an item directly into my bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Worlds Hardest Question
item.dc:creator: @Yogosun Yogosun
item.description:
@Yogosun wrote:

That’s not the answer, because 778 (Steel Gloves) turned into 779 which is a Crest Part !

EVERYTHING stacks in a bank

And none of the items are Noted, all banked items are UnNoted and all the ones in my Inventory were UnNoted

Yet, in the Save file, every item had 1 more number then it’s supposed to have.

Read full topic

item.title: Worlds Hardest Question
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

I know why casue u know when u put it in the bank it stacks? well it cant stack as a non noted item.So its changes to a noted id so it will be noted.Every item that isnt noted like say a whip is 4151 if u wanted to spawn a noted one it would be 4152 u just go up one and its noted.Get it?

Read full topic
